item.title: Using The Argo Ui
item.description: Using the Argo UI This page provides information about using the Argo UI with Shasta. The Argo UI is useful for watching the progress of an install or upgrade and debugging. The UI is read-only and will not accept write operations. Access the Argo UI View Logs Access the Argo UI The Argo UI is accessed through a URL. The URL for a system can be found by the following command.
